message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate closer to that amount?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, the product's worth to me is significantly higher. Could you consider $10,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Unfortunately, I am still unable to meet a price above $8,000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement closer to that amount?
